attributes.action: immediately order the Metropolitan Police to withdraw the police officers investigating the failed coup attempt in Equatorial Guinea and place a permanent ban on their involvement with any criminal investigation overseas unless it is paid for, in toto and in advance, by the government of the country involved.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxpayers in this country should not pay for our police service employees to travel and work criminal investigations in foreign countries where crimes are committed with no involvement of british national or  security interests.
